works.description:
My client, www.gamdang.com, is a modeling
 
agency. The website and its English language copy was 100% written by  
myself. The text on GamDang's home and about pages have been copied onto  

the corresponding pages of the infringing site, word for word, bar
changing  
the company name.

All photos on gamdang.com have been either taken by GamDang Modeling  
employees, photographers hired by GamDang Modeling, or given to GamDang  
Modeling by the models themselves - or the parent or guardian of those  
models in the case of minors - with their express permission and  
understanding that we own the copyright to these images and can publish  
them on our website and/or other marketing materials.

Every single model photo on the infringing site's homepage, "models" page 

and "models photos" page have been taken from gamdang.com. Please note, we
 
have since updated some of our pictures to stay current, for example the  

photos of "Amandine" and "TanYong"  
(http://www.gamdang.com/en/our-models/girls/1-year-old) are different to  

those found on the infringing site, however others remain the same,  
e.g. "Maki", "Namwa", "Peach". I can provide proof of this as these "old" 

images still exist on our file servers.
